column1: Grateful for the extraordinary support across #MI06 yesterday -- THANK YOU! https://t.co/aBYUy3O8R2

I am grateful for the trust - once again - to serve southwest Michigan for another two years. Our country faces enormous challenges & I remain committed to working with the bipartisan Problem Solvers Caucus to get things done in a closely divided political climate. #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Jz8ELMDjfC
Incredible support today - thank you!   Remember if you were in line by 8 STAY in line and you can still vote! #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/hwxD3TN0Qm
Polls are still OPEN for two more hours. If you haven’t voted go VOTE for UPTON! And remember if you’re in line by 8 you can still vote! #MI06 https://t.co/VCxYMwbQ0h
Polls close at 8 PM!  If you haven’t voted yet get out to the polls and VOTE UPTON! #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/ceFiWlDqgb
We’ve got the momentum! Folks are ready to WIN today! #MI06 👍  Tremendous support! https://t.co/22XELHlxjl
Head to the polls and VOTE UPTON today!   Grateful to see so many supporters out in St. Joe this morning #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/47H3Z6hLb1
Election Day is here and the polls are OPEN! #MI06 #TeamUpton  Get out and VOTE! 🇺🇸  https://t.co/KgQdbxn5cW https://t.co/kpbugI6qCy
Tomorrow is ELECTION DAY!  https://t.co/KfPNQ3P8lI #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/vNaT18awqg
Joining @mibigshow at 7:30 to discuss tomorrow’s election! Tune in at https://t.co/kjYHzByyEv  And then join the team to help us finish strong ➡️ https://t.co/xxiEp7ODXP #MI06 https://t.co/Fd3gRyS3U6
We’ve got the team making calls and urging voters to VOTE UPTON IN TWO DAYS! Help us finish strong: https://t.co/KfPNQ3P8lI #mi06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/xu4wTxvw3e
THREE DAYS and #TeamUpton is Getting. Out. The. Vote. #MI06 💪🏼🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/TbrkWSjVLk
Happy Halloween!! We’re only three days away from the election - help us win! #MI06 https://t.co/xxiEp7ODXP https://t.co/kjG9B9gqxm
Four days until Election Day!! We’re going to win this election with your help. https://t.co/z7l4xHQcqF #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/EGnSblWhJo
We’ve got five days left. With your support we’re going to win this election!   https://t.co/z7l4xHQcqF #MI06 🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/UPndXQgbuY
We are in a great position with five days remaining. But we need your help to finish strong. Join the team at https://t.co/4EvXcDRPKO #MI06 #TeamUpton https://t.co/IHYBAgMwTd

We're facing tough times right now that's for certain.   I'm running again to go back to Congress to use my experience and bipartisanship to help SW Michigan and the country end the COVID-19 crisis bring back our jobs and restore hope. #MI06 https://t.co/qh0t5I4Tow
Six days left! Help us finish strong https://t.co/l6la5Lz9X9 #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/K3b3QnpeVY
ONE WEEK UNTIL ELECTION DAY! Help keep a real problem solver in office. https://t.co/l6la5Lz9X9 #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/iVg6S1kgBp

Did you miss last night’s #MI06debate? Get all the highlights here.   We delivered a message of experience bipartisanship and common sense that will help SW Michigan and the country end the COVID-19 crisis bring back our jobs and restore hope. #MI06 https://t.co/FvGRBDS11x
.@JonHoadley’s hopeless economic agenda includes job-killing tax hikes on small businesses and a new 45 cent gas tax increase on Michigan drivers. #MI06 https://t.co/AdCtPFfRPV
Jobs jobs jobs. It’s a top issue in this election. In the next Congress we have to be laser-focused on ending the COVID-19 crisis and bringing back SW Michigan jobs #MI06 https://t.co/1Hb3smn3eP

Southwest Michigan workers families hospitals and small businesses are facing unprecedented challenges.  I am raising my hand to work with anyone to deliver results and get help to those who need it most. #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/hE40JL5Dxo

THANK YOU for tuning into our debate! Solving problems for the good folks of SW MI remains my TOP priority now & always. While @jonhoadley’s far-left agenda is out of step with our SW MI values I’m committed to delivering results for our families & small biz. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/Kyt4EqiAVn

Just last week I was named the most bipartisan legislator in the COUNTRY receiving a perfect score of 100. @Jonhoadley would vote as a rubber stamp for Dem leadership 100% of the time. #MI06Debate https://t.co/OiAkXslZeD
“Fred shows up. He's not just a politician. He's looking for ways to make people's lives better.” -U.S. Navy Veteran Michael Brown #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/P8EnHggw7q
Too many people only talk about solving problems – especially near an election. I work to solve problems time and time and time again. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/AK6xQAyupq

.@jonhoadley will be a rubber stamp for Democrat leadership in Washington. In Lansing he has voted with his party 95% of the time. It's no secret that he will prioritize his party's radical agenda in Congress at the expense of SW MI families. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/HzvY7x5A5U

.@jonhoadley is willfully misleading voters again. I have NEVER voted to reduce Social Security & Medicare benefits for our seniors EVER. Hard-working folks have earned these benefits & I will always protect them in Congress. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/iW1gFKnjBI
No matter what @JonHoadley claims I have worked and will continue to work with both parties to lower prescription drug costs. Period. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/U2en2WkzsY

I have always fought to lower prescription drug prices while also ensuring the U.S. remains a leader in developing cures to the world's toughest diseases. That's why I strongly supported H.R. 19 the Lower Costs More Cures Act that does both. #MI06Debate #MI06

Prescription drug prices are just too high for folks across the country. I was just 1 of 5 Republicans to support H.R. 987 the Strengthening Health Care & Lowering Prescription Drug Costs Act. I also supported the H.R. 19 the Lower Costs More Cures Act. #MI06Debate #MI06

.@jonhoadley is once again misleading voters on my health care record. The truth is I was one of 8 Republicans to support H. Res. 271 “Condemning the Trump Administration’s Legal Campaign to Take Away Americans’ Health Care." #MI06Debate #MI06

Despite @jonhoadley's misleading claims about my record of course I DO NOT support removing protections for folks w/ pre-existing conditions. Any claim to the contrary is false & misleading. #MI06Debate #MI06

Under @jonhoadley’s strong support for Medicare for All 150 million Americans would lose their private health insurance & taxpayers would also have to foot the bill to the tune of more than $32 TRILLION. #MI06Debate #MI06

.@jonhoadley made his stance on public safety clear. His vision would make our communities less safe. Law enforcement needs MORE resources to do their jobs – not fewer. That's why law enforcement would be concerned if Jon was elected. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/hYtxOyPiCw

.@JonHoadley turned his back on law enforcement. I signed a pledge to stand with law enforcement. Only one candidate in the #MI06 race is committed to public safety. #MI06Debate https://t.co/coKEeXA7gW

I will NEVER vote to defund the police. That's why I have the support of the Police Officers Association of Michigan & law enforcement officers across #MI06. They know I'll always have their backs just as they always have ours. https://t.co/xqPlbCZzar #MI06Debate

I’m about action - not just about talk. I am a cosponsor of the JUSTICE Act & one of 3 Republicans to vote for the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act to actually move the ball forward on real police reform. #MI06Debate #MI06

This summer I joined thousands of folks in protests across SW MI to condemn police brutality and call for an end to racial injustice. We must always work toward building a more perfect union for ALL Americans & we can do so together. #MI06Debate #MI06

.@jonhoadley at a June 12 community event: "It is frustrating that everything but police got cut whenever there was a question...I think it’s important we’re having this conversation now about reprioritizing parts of our budget."🤔#MI06Debate #MI06
.@jonhoadley’s vision for SW MI is dangerous & our brave law enforcement officers VERY MUCH AGREE. https://t.co/MqUVmjY77m #MI06Debate #MI06

.@jonhoadley is trying to walk back his vote against law enforcement. Here's the truth – the resolution asked local gov’ts not to defund the police. He voted against it. He turned his back on our law enforcement. https://t.co/Jx5wgwN2Fe #MI06Debate #MI06

@JonHoadley The HEROES Act was never a real proposal to deliver real relief to folks across the country. More than a dozen Democrats opposed it & the White House issued a veto warning. We need a BIPARTISAN package that will deliver immediate relief. #MI06Debate #MI06

My PPP Forgiveness Act cuts burdensome red tape & saved businesses time & money by converting PPP loans for the smallest firms into grants. My record is clear here - I will continue to fight for our small biz as they look to get back on their feet #MI06Debate #MI06

Ever since relief talks stalled on Cap Hill my Problem Solvers Caucus colleagues & I have been hard at work on our March to Common Ground bill. This is a serious bipartisan proposal that delivers real relief to folks & can actually become law. #MI06Debate #MI06

When our small biz in SW MI needed our support I worked to secure billions of dollars to help keep their doors open. The #PPP has protected 51M jobs - including 1.5M in MI - & I was proud to strongly vote to replenish it when funds ran dry. #MI06Debate #MI06
Make no mistake: @JonHoadley’s economic agenda would destroy jobs crush small businesses and hinder southwest Michigan’s middle class. #MI06Debate #MI06 https://t.co/w4kF77sKDJ

COVID-19 has opened our eyes to the urgent need to make life-saving cures in the USA. My 21st Century Cures Act - which passed w/ wide bipartisan support - did just that & will help us safely develop a COVID vaccine faster than ever #MI06Debate https://t.co/L393WaIN0g #MI06

When COVID-19 first hit American soil I was helping day and night on our major federal response. I strongly supported both the CARES Act & the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to deliver real relief to our families small businesses schools & workers. #MI06Debate #MI06

As COVID cases spike nationwide we know we need to pass another relief package. That's why I've worked nonstop w/ the Problem Solvers Caucus to pass a bipartisan bill that will help the millions of folks who are still struggling. https://t.co/heu7Cfk5nF #MI06Debate #MI06

Ready for tonight’s debate! Thanks for the INCREDIBLE supporters who came out early to say hello. Let’s win this thing!   Tune in at 7 PM to watch on CW 7 or watch live online here: https://t.co/z6ZmxxLcZb #mi06 #mi06debate https://t.co/SoHufz2lDq
Great team! Let's win this thing! #MI06debate #MI06 https://t.co/UP8eYt9P1v
Eight days away! Help us finish strong.  ➡️ https://t.co/l6la5Lz9X9 #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/rzHBJi5SGg

TONIGHT AT 7 PM - the #MI06Debate will be on the CW or on @wwmtnews's website. This election is important and we'll be discussing issues that matter most to SW MI workers families and small businesses. #MI06 https://t.co/Ok1hF1UL7v
Tune in tomorrow to @wwmtnews for the #MI06Debate at 7 PM. We’ll be discussing the issues that matter most to southwest Michigan voters. https://t.co/LZRGhzABXr
Down to ten days! Help Fred win here ➡️ https://t.co/l6la5Lz9X9 #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/MrusXdDjgA

Fred Upton wants to help people and he does.  "He shows up. He's not just a politician. I see Fred trying to find solutions."  "He knows how to protect families and jobs in west Michigan."   "This is an important election and this is a clear choice - it's Fred Upton." #MI06 https://t.co/uAki6nAJKg
11 days until Election Day! Help Fred win here ➡️ https://t.co/l6la5Lz9X9 #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/cDcRhjXMKw
12 days! Help keep a real problem solver in office. https://t.co/iRflFZk7cA #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/xc6GuMgfBY
Letter to the editor in the @HeraldPalladium: "Fred Upton is the ONLY pro-public safety candidate in the #MI06 race."    Let's win this in 12 days!   https://t.co/jlKVXK1ogE https://t.co/p3Drm46hG8

.@JonHoadley wants a promotion but let's look at his record 🔎  ❌Votes with his party 95% of the time  ❌Backs a 45 cent gas tax  ❌Supported a 40% tax hike on small business   He just doesn't get it. Putting politics over people. We can't afford Jon Hoadley #MI06 https://t.co/r4zoN19Jpc
The countdown is on. 13 days. Help us to finish strong ➡️ https://t.co/iRflFZ2wl2 #MI06 https://t.co/I2REkepk3i

Honored to be named by @commongroundcom as the most bipartisan elected official in the country with a complete 100% score!   @JonHoadley received an abysmal 4% rating.   I don’t just talk I walk the walk. #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/9Xe31n5rbh

My folks have never missed an election and voted absentee today! 🇺🇸 Be sure to make a plan to drop yours in the mail as soon as possible! All ballots must be RECEIVED by Election Day on November 3rd! #VOTE #TeamUpton #MI06 https://t.co/G2k1SE9Nen

We are tempted to label our elected leaders as far left or far right. Let me suggest that Fred is neither. Instead he is focused on the most important role that he can play as our voice in our nation’s capital – as a voice of reason. #MI06   --> https://t.co/Ae5Tdjf2vD
Thankful for the support from the @detroitnews Editorial Board! #MI06 https://t.co/pqRUuJWJi3

Grateful for the kind words!   "Fred Upton is the sort of congressman everyone says they want — a pragmatist who places the needs of his district above partisan politics and reaches across the aisle to find workable solutions." #MI06 https://t.co/To7AhUGVNQ

Our country faces a number of challenges right now. I remain 100% committed to working with anyone from any party to try and get things done for #MI06 families small biz & schools. If it’s a good idea let’s get it done. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/Ht5fzBx8yE
An honor to be endorsed by the @MichFarmBureau. Our farmers growers and producers are really the backbone of southwest Michigan. Read more -> https://t.co/4q1HnCjA13  #MI06 https://t.co/SnqljeLs1D

Small businesses have been hit hard. And they need help. But what is @JonHoadley’s plan?   ⬆️ Raising taxes on thousands of small businesses ✅ Opening them up to frivolous lawsuits ❌ Bankrupt mom-and-pops and non-profits and hurt employees.  Hoadley’s plan is hopeless. #MI06 https://t.co/KbFyAkb5y4

Glory was a dancer on a cruise ship when COVID-19 hit the United States. Authorities told Glory and her family she would have to stay on the ship. That's when her parents called Fred. Fred worked with the federal government and local officials to secure Glory's return home. https://t.co/b8PQ2SAlsI

30 days out from Election Day! The team continues to work hard to keep a proven problem solver in office fighting for southwest Michigan.   Help us win: https://t.co/4EvXcDRPKO #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/dcLVgjxOLL
One month until Election Day join our team today https://t.co/iRflFZ2wl2 https://t.co/UBSmMjOaAv
Our police officers fight every day to protect our communities and keep us safe and I promise to always have their back in that fight. #MI06 https://t.co/fxYxqktquz

The COVID-19 crisis hit and doctors and nurses knew who to turn to: Fred Upton. He worked around the clock to get them critical medical supplies and testing to protect frontline workers & patients. #MI06 https://t.co/mwvFP4HakW
I view myself as a PROBLEM SOLVER willing to work with anybody any President to get the job done for southwest Michigan. #MI06 #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/uMw7ThLAAA

THANK YOU for your support during the #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO! Our bipartisan approach to governing continues to deliver RESULTS for southwest Michigan families small businesses & our communities. @JonHoadley’s extreme partisan agenda is clearly out-of-step with #MI06. https://t.co/xdsOCy23Nm
Too many people only talk about solving problems – especially near an election. I work to solve problems time and time and time again. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06 https://t.co/AK6xQAyupq
This race is an easy contrast. Bottom line: I’m a problem solver. @JonHoadley is a problem creator. #MI06 #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/hQcEInCgap

Fixing our broken immigration system is a priority. Just this past year I helped write & voted for the Farm Workforce Modernization Act a strong bipartisan plan to help our ag industry & ag workers. https://t.co/wJSukUHiZB #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

I traveled to our Southern border w/ the Problem Solvers Caucus to see firsthand the crisis we face. We know we need to work on real immigration reform & secure our border. We simply can't keep kicking the can down the road https://t.co/uDZvf6ajmk #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

.@JonHoadley turned his back on law enforcement. I signed a pledge to stand with law enforcement. Only one candidate in the #MI06 race is committed to public safety. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/2IFeDWTOJJ
.@jonhoadley is dangerous for southwest Michigan. But you don’t have to take our word for it. Law enforcement STRONGLY agrees - > https://t.co/MqUVmjY77m #MI06 #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO

I’m about action - not just about talk. I am a cosponsor of the JUSTICE Act & one of 3 Republicans to vote for the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act to actually move the ball forward on real police reform. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

I have participated in a # of peaceful protests in SW MI because Black lives most certainly matter. I've had numerous meetings with community leaders in KZoo to discuss racial injustice & the need for police reform. We must do better. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

Prescription drug prices are just too high for folks across the country. I helped introduce HR 19 the Lower Costs More Cures Act & I was one of five GOPs to vote for HR 987 the Strengthening Health Care & Lowering Prescription Drug Costs Act. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06
.@jonhoadley supports Medicare for All - a $32 trillion government-run healthcare program that would strip private health insurance from 150M Americans. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

.@jonhoadley is once again misleading voters on my health care record. FACT - I was one of 8 Republicans to support H. Res. 271 “Condemning the Trump Administration’s Legal Campaign to Take Away Americans’ Health Care." #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

.@jonhoadley's lies about my record on pre-existing conditions are flat out wrong. I do NOT support removing coverage for folks with preexisting conditions & never will. Any claim to the contrary is false & misleading. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

I’ve been working day & night w/ my Problem Solvers Caucus colleagues on our March to Common Ground proposal. This framework is bipartisan would be signed by the President & deliver urgent relief to those in the most need https://t.co/heu7Cfk5nF #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

From day one I have strongly supported robust relief for American families workers small biz & schools. I voted to pass both the historic CARES Act & the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to help folks weather this storm. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

.@jonhoadley supports the Green New Deal a $93 trillion dollar partisan plan that would cost SW MI households more than $600K each. This is a burden families simply cannot bear. I'm focused on real solutions that protect our environment. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

Let me be absolutely clear - I will ALWAYS fight to protect the Great Lakes. I've long been an ardent supporter of the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative which is the largest investment in preserving these natural treasures for decades to come #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

Protecting our outdoor spaces is a TOP priority for me. That's why I strongly supported the Great American Outdoors Act which will provide $900M a year to conserve & protect our public lands for generations to come. https://t.co/TP6hM8Fapj #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

Broadband for rural communities has been ignored too long. That's why I worked w/ Dem. Whip Rep. Jim Clyburn to introduce a bill to fund shovel-ready high-speed internet projects so consumers can access broadband w/in 1 yr https://t.co/wUn811cDtb #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

FACT: @JonHoadley’s support for Medicare for All means he’s ready and willing to take away your health care. His out-of-step agenda won’t fly with #MI06 voters. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/MBB34LzM6J

I have always fought to lower prescription drug prices while also ensuring the U.S. remains a leader in developing cures to the world's toughest diseases. That's why I strongly supported H.R. 19 the Lower Costs More Cures Act that does both. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06
I served on the bipartisan Social Security Caucus my entire career. I want to strengthen both social security and medicare. #MI06 #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/gfHwNZ2ktZ

My 21st Century Cures Act passed in 2016 w/ broad bipartisan support to expedite the discovery & development of life-saving cures in a safe & effective way. Thanks to our bill we will see a COVID-19 vaccine faster than ever https://t.co/L393WaIN0g #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO #MI06

FACT: I was just named one of the most bipartisan elected officials in the country. My commitment is to solutions civility and bipartisanship – not political games. #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO  #MI06 https://t.co/Bxs2o91rRI

#TeamUpton is ready for this morning’s debate with @jonhoadley on @WKZONews. I’ve got a long track record of working with both parties to SOLVE PROBLEMS and DELIVER RESULTS for #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/giRVcBmt6J

Coming up this morning at 9 AM ➡️ I'm looking forward to our #MI06 Congressional debate on @WKZONews. We'll be talking about the issues that matter most to SW Michigan. Tune in at https://t.co/Qz8sQ8dpra & follow along using #UptonHoadleyDebateOnWKZO https://t.co/2ScCOgIcUf

Tomorrow morning at 9 AM I'm looking forward to our #MI06 Congressional debate on @WKZONews. We'll be talking about the issues that matter most to the families small businesses and communities here in SW Michigan. Hope you can tune in: https://t.co/WKSWUjyw2B https://t.co/vyWdCI5OCT
No days off for #TeamUpton - 38 days until victory and our team is CRUSHING! Join us: https://t.co/iRflFZ2wl2 #SignedSealedDelivered #MI06 https://t.co/KicIKSGjb8
I care about delivering for Michigan veterans. They’ve served our nation honorably and I will always make sure that veterans have the recognition and care they deserve. #MI06 https://t.co/2Uc3ZtQKfx
#LetsFlyMI 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/0Dpt9CldPc

We’re 7 weeks from Election Day and our team is READY. Want to help us win? Email info@uptonforallofus.com for large & yard signs or to volunteer! It’s all hands on deck & we couldn’t do it without our amazing team and volunteers. Join #TeamUpton today! #MI06 https://t.co/licjdCSbex

I'm honored to have the support of @MIPOAM. I will continue to back the blue.   @JonHoadley has voted against law enforcement & sided w/ defund the police.   The thin blue line risks their lives to protect ours. They've got our backs and I will always have theirs. #MI06 https://t.co/sPq6tM93JT

Solving problems. Getting results. Working with both sides to deliver for Southwest Michigan. I’ll always fight for our communities and to put people over partisanship.  Watch our first ad of the 2020 election ⤵️ https://t.co/rYHF6GLhjy

On the radio at 7:30 w/ @MPShiels to talk about the police pledge. Any time I have an opportunity to chat w/ an officer here in SW MI I always say 'thank you.' They don't hear that enough and I will always be proud to stand for them.  Tune in ➡️➡️ https://t.co/kjYHzByyEv #MI06 https://t.co/gos5Nll8ii
Our police officers fight every day to protect our communities and keep us safe and I promise to always have their back in that fight.   I am proud to stand for them. #MI06 https://t.co/36qL1SAUdi
SW Michigan students should be able to focus on their education - whatever the format - without having to worry about where their next meal will come from. #MI06   https://t.co/8JhVsfAIQC
Great day hitting the pavement. Making the calls. Connecting with voters. That’s how we win. Only 66 days left - join us: https://t.co/4EvXcDRPKO #MI06 https://t.co/aG57FpnlsB

Great to talk with our volunteer crew this morning including passionate students from around the 6th District and WWII Veteran Dick Clark. Now it's time to connect with voters! Join us next time: https://t.co/iRflFZ2wl2 https://t.co/bmc9DNmLW4

Great visit to Barber Packaging Company today. When COVID-19 hit they started producing PPE for our community and the PPP loans from the CARES Act helped protect countless jobs.   Thanks for all you do for SW Michigan! #MI06 https://t.co/hne12d0O50

Our Team Upton volunteers are fired up to win in 83 days! Can’t thank them enough for everything they’re doing for Southwest Michigan. We’ve got a long track record of coming together to solve problems - let’s keep going! #MI06 https://t.co/M2UvBaPejm

Rebuilding a healthy economy will take strong leadership and bipartisan solutions. Last week @JohnJamesMI joined me in Southwest Michigan to meet with job creators and small business owners to discuss ways to bring our jobs back and help our workers return safely. #MI06 https://t.co/shhRvLx0IQ

Important conversation with @JohnJamesMI and job creators in Kalamazoo this afternoon about the challenges small businesses are facing during COVID-19. We have to come together to bring back our jobs & rebuild a healthy economy here in Michigan. #MI06 https://t.co/VV42mffnSU

Problem-solving over partisan politics. That's always been my priority. When COVID-19 hit Michigan my team got to work to make sure workers families & small biz got the help they needed and that a vaccine was on the way. #MI06 https://t.co/TuJ2Oa47d8

Joining @WKZONews at 7:50 after last night's primary victory to discuss the campaign ahead & our bipartisan track record of solving problems & getting results. That's the message we'll be sharing with voters as we look ahead to November.  Tune in -> https://t.co/7jousCEmpy #MI06

On to November!  Lots of folks talk about being a problem solver. But I don't just talk the talk; I walk the walk.   Excited to connect w/ voters listen to their concerns & discuss bipartisan solutions to advance SW Michigan’s recovery. We're all in this together! #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/wqd0bJIHRw
Polls are open until 8 PM tonight! And if you still have an absentee ballot you can drop it off before 8 PM. #MI06 🇺🇸 https://t.co/9TRHARNzGK

Team Upton‘s working hard to get out the vote today! Quick zoom call to thank all of our extraordinary volunteers for everything they do for this campaign. Remember to get out to vote by 8 pm! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 https://t.co/tyHpkYXBxF
Get out and vote! Polls are open till 8pm. Find your polling location here: https://t.co/OXvpL8HeCU #MI06 https://t.co/KeYN45bY69

I know folks are concerned and I am too. I remain in constant contact with my colleagues in the Congress and the bipartisan Problem Solvers Caucus as we continue to work on solutions to provide relief to workers small business owners and families.

CORONAVIRUS UPDATE: This week I have continued to reach out to small business owners school leaders church officials public health officials and community leaders to check in with them during the coronavirus crisis.

I will continue to share regular updates on my social media channels as well as through emails. In addition I would encourage folks to visit https://t.co/vpvKzfG19y to access helpful tips and ways to keep themselves and their loved ones safe during this outbreak. #MI06
Find contacts for your local health department by visiting this link. Of course in the event of an emergency please call 911.   https://t.co/ti44fU26zz

WHO TO CALL: If you suspect you have contracted the coronavirus (COVID-19) please do not go straight to your medical provider or the hospital. Call your doctor or local health department FIRST for further direction. This helps ensure the safety of all.
Protecting the health and safety of all Americans must remain our top priority. The fact is that the only way to break this cycle is to limit person to person contact.

IMPORTANT: As the coronavirus outbreak grows more serious we need all hands on deck. This situation should not be taken lightly. I understand folks are concerned and frustrated. We need to step up. We’re in this together.
